Fact: Cucumbers have the highest water content of any solid food, being made up of 96% water!
In 1893, the Supreme Court had to rule whether tomatoes were a vegetable or a fruit. Huh?? (Nix v. Hedden)
Our desire for comfort foods may begin in the womb.

A cow in Cuba was genetically manipulated to produce four times the milk of an average American cow. Ubre Blanca, as the cow was named, was eulogized with military honors and had a life-size marble statue made of her. This program was, of course, funded by Fidel Castro.
Peppers have more vitamin C than oranges.
Margherita pizza was named after the queen of Naples.
Cashews grow in quite a... disturbing manner.
Beef and liver paste are out of this world! They were the first meal to be eaten in space.
Cheese is the most stolen food in the world.
There are billions of pounds of cheese stored underground in Springfield, Missouri.
There was a foiled Nazi plan to kill Winston Churchill with a chocolate bar bomb.
Dark chocolate contains more iron than Spinach.
In the 1920s tapeworms were used as a weight loss supplementation. Hm...
Pythagoras believed that beans and humans shared a common ancestor, and refused to eat them.
Nutmeg is a hallucinogen.
80 Mcdonalds burgers are sold every second.
Tonic water can glow in the dark.
The word 'poutine' means 'mess'.
Lemons float in water but limes sink. When life gives you limes...
Carrots become sweeter in winter as a protective response.
A bunch of bananas is called a 'hand'. A singular banana is called a 'finger'.
Pistachios are fruits.
25% of all hazelnuts are used to make Nutella.
Pots of honey have been found in ancient Egyptian tombs dating back 3,000 years ago. They're still perfectly edible!
In an effort to make kids eat healthier, McDonald's made a bubble-gum flavored broccoli. That failed, and now we have triple cheeseburgers.
Mustard has been been around for a LONG time. Humans have used ground mustard seeds as a spice as far back as 9000 BCE.
Food in airplanes tastes differently as the high altitudes alter your taste buds. More specifically, your sweet taste buds are inhibited while your umami taste buds are greatly enhanced.
Corned beef was smuggled into space on a Gemini 3 mission.
Wine has been around longer than civilization.
Canadians consume more macaroni & cheese than any other nation.
